entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Light snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
